name: Steve the friendly Robot
description:
The story is about a small little robot who just tries his best. This little fella is called 5T3V3 and everyone around the neighbourhood loves him, because he always tries his best! This time around, he's once again going to help his favourite grandpa of the neighbourhood. By completing various minigames, 5T3V3 is able to upgrade the house and help the grandpa. Who said love is limited to humans. We love 5T3V3 and you will too!

Notes:

We're all currently at our humble beginnings and currently studying .Unfortunatly we didn't had enough time to include everything we worked on. We hope you can enjoy the Game anyway.
